articles.title: Fourth Int'l Scientific and Technological Book Exhibition to Be Held
articles.content:
Fourth Int'l Scientific and Technological Book Exhibition to Be Held 
    Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- The 4th Pyongyang International Scientific and Technological Book Exhibition will be held from September 12 to 14.
 The exhibition will draw at least 30 bodies of over 10 countries and an international organization. Valuable scientific and technological books and data in various fields will be on display.    
 The exhibition will offer an important opportunity of strengthening exchange and cooperation in science and technology among countries as it will reflect the requirements of the age of science and technology, the IT age.

articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Italian Figure
    Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Giancarlo Elia Valori, director of the Italian Institute of International Relations, on a visit to the DPRK.
 The gift was handed to Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, by the director.

articles.title: Greetings to Slovak President
articles.content:
Greetings to Slovak President
    Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People��s Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Ivan Gasparovic, president of the Slovak Republic, Wednesday on the occasion of its constitutional day.
 Warmly congratulating the president and the people of Slovakia on this day, the message sincerely wished the president a greater success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country.    
 It expressed the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger in mutual interests.

articles.title: Greetings to Vietnamese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Vietnamese President
    Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, today sent a message of greetings to Vietnamese President Tran Duc Luong on the occasion of the 59th anniversary of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.
 The message sent warm greetings to the president and the people of Vietnam on this occasion.    
 It wished him and his people success in the work for the progress and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: WPK Delegation Leaves for China
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Leaves for China
    Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) led by Pak Yong Sok, chairman of the Central Control Commission of the WPK, left here today to attend the 3rd international meeting of Asian political parties to be held in Beijing.
 It was seen off at the airport by Pak Kyong Son, vice department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, and Guan Huabing, Chinese charge d' affaires ad interim here.

articles.title: Credentials to Kim Yong Nam
articles.content:
Credentials to Kim Yong Nam
    Pyongyang, September 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Harry Agustin Bodan Shields, new Nicaragua ambassador e. p. to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 On hand was Vice-Minister of Foreign Affair Choe Su Hon.
